description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Take your avatar for a rollercoaster drive at the Racedrome! Battle it out on 16 twisty tracks with fierce computer opponents, or online over Xbox LIVE. Includes a rewind feature so you can retry those risky maneuvers.
description.short: Take your avatar for a rollercoaster drive at the Racedrome! Battle it out on 16 twisty tracks with fierce computer opponents, or online over Xbox LIVE. Includes a rewind feature so you can retry those risky maneuvers.
